content.value:
Vigyan Hostel is situated in Cali, 400 meters from Pan-American Park and 2.3 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral. The guest house has a terrace and views of the garden. Our hostel is strategically located in one of the most outstanding neighbourhoods in Cali known as San Fernando Viejo. El parque Del Perro is just 100 meters from the hostel and the stadium El Pascual Guerrero is just 200 meters away. The hostel is also 2.6 km from Isaacs theatre. And the Airport is located 20.9 km away.

We offer spacious dormitories with bunk beds and private rooms. Certain rooms include a terrace or balcony. Private rooms include a queen size bed, private bathrooms, AC, desk and their own TV. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Located in Cali, 1.1 km from Pan-American Park, Vigyan Hostel provides air-conditioned rooms and a garden. The property is around 3.4 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral, 3.4 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 3.6 km from La Ermita Church. The accommodation features luggage storage space and free WiFi.

Cañaveralejo's Bullring is 4 km from Vigyan Hostel, while National Natural Park Farallones de Cali is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

description.description: At Vigyan Hostel we have everything you need to make your stay unforgettable. From outdoor games like ping pong, chess, parcheesi, sapo (traditional Colombian game), to sitting areas where you can enjoy a book, to a living room where you can watch a movie, football game or play PlayStation. In addition, Vigyan hostel is a property that also integrates with nature to create a relaxed environment and positive vibes.
